amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 118-407 to ensure that exemptions or benefits provided by the bill may only apply to companies that do not impose "junk fees" on customers.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to limit exemptions or benefits provided by the bill that do not impose junk fees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 212 (Roll no. 74).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 212 (Roll no. 74).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
